meaningMnemonic: In your <radical>warehouse</radical> you use your <radical>knife</radical> to <kanji>create</kanji>. You keep old pieces of wood in your warehouse, and you use your knife to carve them into new things that only you could create.
readingMnemonic: When you <kanji>create</kanji> it's good for your <reading>sou</reading>l (そう). It's so freeing, in fact, that when you get really into your creating, sometimes you'd swear your soul was floating a little bit outside of your body. But every time you notice, it sinks back down. Hmm.
